name: CLIMB OUT!
description:
You have fallen and you must CLIMB OUT!



  • Climb as high as you can for as long as you can.

  • Avoid obstacles and the ever-rising lava!

  • Procedural levels.

  • Compete against the world for the highest score on the leaderboards!

How far can you make it?



Like retro arcade games like this for the cost of a game's play at the arcade?
